de.tEngine.core

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tEngine.core.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Camera, PointLight, SimpleTerrain

    public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds an instance of a model placed in the scenery
    Author:
    Tim Schneider

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Model model
      The model the instance uses
      protected Transform transform
      The transformation of the instance in world space

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameObject(Model model)
      Create a new GameObject using the given model.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameObject

        public GameObject(Model model)
        Create a new GameObject using the given model. The transformation is by default at origin.
        Parameters:
        model -

    • Method Detail

      • getTransform

        public Transform getTransform()
        Returns the transformation in space of the GameObject.
        Returns:
        Transformation

      • RenderSingleInstance

        @Deprecated
public void RenderSingleInstance(de.tEngine.shaders.BasicShader s)
        Deprecated. Not supported anymore
        Renders a single instance of the model used by this GameObject. Try to avoid using this method because it is not supported anymore.
        Parameters:
        s - The shader used to render

      • RenderMultipleInstances

        public void RenderMultipleInstances(de.tEngine.shaders.BasicShader s)
        Renders multiple instances of one model. IMPORTANT: You have to call prepareMultirendering() at the model first. And after rendering all instances, you have to cleanup by invoking cleanUpMultiRendering() manually.
        Parameters:
        s - The shader used to render

      • getModel

        public Model getModel()
        Returns the model of the GameObject
        Returns:
